scripts.start: concurrently "yarn" "cd software-capstone-fe && yarn && yarn start" "cd software-capstone-be && yarn && yarn start"
scripts.winstart: concurrently "yarn" "cd software-capstone-fe && yarn && yarn winstart" "cd software-capstone-be && yarn && yarn start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd software-capstone-fe && yarn start" "cd software-capstone-be && yarn dev"
scripts.windev: concurrently "cd software-capstone-fe && yarn winstart" "cd software-capstone-be && yarn start"
